title: Safety Info | IPD Information | PREVNAR 13® (Pneumococcal 13-valent Conjugate Vaccine [Diphtheria CRM197 Protein])
author: - Denia Varrasso; MD
description: Learn about IPD and how PREVNAR 13® (Pneumococcal 13-valent Conjugate Vaccine [Diphtheria CRM197 Protein]) may help protect your baby. See risks and benefits.
cleaned_text: Share your story If you are the parent or guardian of a child who had pneumococcal disease before the age of 2 (such as pneumococcal meningitis or blood infection), or if you yourself had pneumococcal disease as a child before the age of 2, Pfizer would like to hear from you. Your story can help and encourage others. To learn more, and find out if you are eligible to participate in promotional and educational activities, please call: Any information you provide will be kept in strict confidence according to our privacy policy.
